org.prebake.os
Class OsProcess

java.lang.Object
  org.prebake.os.OsProcess

public abstract class OsProcess
extends java.lang.Object

Abstracts away process management so we can build piping on top of ProcessBuilder or implement it natively if need be.

We assume that all setup every method that can only be called before run() happens in the same thread that run is called in and that thereafter, this object needs to be thread-safe.
